name: Kaboom Box
description:
Test your wits and 3d visualization skills to defuse increasingly complicated bombs.

Controls:

  • Right click and drag to spin the object.
  • Left click to interact with the tile under your cursor.

Remove the core of the bomb to win, but be careful as it may be dangerous to remove without proper understanding of the circuitry.

Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49.
